member.name: EV_EXTRA_CERT_CHAIN_POLICY_STATUS
member.summary: The EV_EXTRA_CERT_CHAIN_POLICY_STATUS structure is returned in the pvExtraPolicyStatus member of a structure. The structure contains policy flags returned from a call to the function.
